meanings.sent1: The new sneakers are so voguish among my friends.
meanings.sent2: Her voguish outfit caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog tried to look voguish by wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The voguish hairstyle swept through the school like a colorful wave.
meanings.sent5: The voguish dance moves made the performance unforgettable.

meanings.definition: In the style of the latest trends.
meanings.sent1: The boutique displayed voguish dresses in the window.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to stay voguish with her unique sense of style.
meanings.sent3: The catwalk model strutted in a voguish manner, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His voguish art pieces spoke volumes about modern creativity.
meanings.sent5: The voguish decor of the cafe created a cozy atmosphere for customers.
